ValidationRule.description: A CIR cannot be send when deferral status is Active (US: 20389)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Parent.CH_RecordTypeCheck__c, ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c,"Customer Information Request"), ISPICKVAL( Parent.CH_DeferralStatus__c, "Active") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer Information Requests cannot be sent out when Deferral Status is Active
